text: Ron uses a napkin to wipe mouth after eating spaghetti.
Anna takes big bites from the far end of the plate.
Garry talks with food in his mouth.
Smith waits for everyone at the table to be served before starting to eat.
Chloe reaches across the table to grab the salt instead of asking for it to be passed.
Debora says 'please' and 'thank you' when her meal is served.
Ryan licks fingers as he eats his favourite food.
Ben slurps soup making a loud noise.
Hank sits upright at the dining table.
Kiale takes a bite from the fork while holding it like a shovel.
Frank makes a fuss as he does not like the food.
Sam asks for salt to be passed at the table.
